title: Web Developer
job_description: As a Web Developer at PECO Software, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our frontend solutions with a focus on scalability and usability. You will work closely with design and backend teams to ensure a seamless user experience.
tasks: Develop and maintain user-friendly web applications
Implement UI components based on design mockups
Collaborate with UX designers and backend developers
Test and debug across browsers and devices
technical_skills: Experience with React, Vue, or Angular
Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript (ES6+)
Knowledge of Webpack, Vite, or similar build tools
Basic understanding of SEO and WCAG
personal_skills: Focus on detail and user experience
Good at collaborating and receiving feedback
Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
